lead_paragraph: Willie Williams, the linebacker who was allowed to enroll at Miami two years ago despite having 11 entries on his arrest record, has asked the university to release him from his scholarship. Williams was touted as one of the nation’s best defensive players coming out of high school, but he never became a starter.
